application_body: Most respectfully, I beg to state that I am not in a condition to come to the school since I am suffering from fever. I have been prescribed by our family doctor to take proper rest for at least 2 days. Hence, kindly grant me leave from 2021-04-21 to 2021-04-23. I shall be really grateful to you.

With due respect and humble submission, I would like to inform you that I was absent in school from the last day, due to the celebration of my uncleâ€™s marriage ceremony. I request you to permit me leave for those days and allow me to sit in the class. I would be highly obliged and thankful to you.

I would like to inform you that I was absent in school from the last three days. The main reason behind my absence is that I was not at my home. My family urgently planned for going to the village. Therefore I was unable to attend my class during those days. Kindly grant me leave for those days and allow me to sit in the class. I shall be thankful to you for your kindness.
